description: Apple Magic Keyboard drivers and layouts for Windows

installer.script: Push-Location "$dir\All Keyboard Layouts (1.0.3.40)"; & "$dir\All Keyboard Layouts (1.0.3.40)\install_keyboard_layouts.bat" /S; Pop-Location

uninstaller.script: Push-Location "$dir\All Keyboard Layouts (1.0.3.40)"; & "$dir\All Keyboard Layouts (1.0.3.40)\uninstall_keyboard_layouts.bat" /S; Pop-Location
